mapper.select: select z.*,'' as PROCESSING_PERSON from TB_SAAS_REGISTER z where ID=#{id}

SELECT distinct ai.*,(SELECT to_char(wm_concat(distinct U . NAME)) FROM TB_WFM_ACTIVITY act1,TB_USER U WHERE u.IDCARD=ACT1.HANDLEPERSONIDS AND ACT1.ACTIVITYSTATUS='待办' AND act1.INSTANCEID = ins. ID AND ACT1.ACTIVITYTYPE is NULL) AS PROCESSING_PERSON from TB_SAAS_REGISTER ai ,TB_WFM_ACTIVITY act,TB_WFM_INSTANCE ins ,TB_WFM_WORKFLOWMODEL m
AND ai.STATUS not in (-1,0)
AND ai.STATUS in (1,7,101,102)
AND ai.STATUS in (5,8)
AND ai.STATUS = #{p.status}
AND ( ai.CREATOR_NAME = #{p.appName} OR ai.ORDER_NUMBER = #{p.appName} )
and ai.ID=ins.BUSINESSID and act.INSTANCEID = ins.ID and m.ID=act.MODELID
and (act.HANDLEPERSONIDS = #{p.user.idcard} or m.noticeperon like concat(concat('%', #{p.user.idcard}),'%') )
and act.HANDLEPERSONIDS =#{p.user.idcard} AND act.ACTIVITYSTATUS='待办' AND act.ACTIVITYTYPE is NULL
and act.HANDLEPERSONIDS !=#{p.user.idcard} AND act.ACTIVITYSTATUS='待办' AND act.ACTIVITYTYPE is NULL
ORDER BY ai.MODIFIED_TIME DESC

select ID,NAME,CREATOR,CREATOR_NAME,CREATE_TIME,BUILD_STATUS from TB_SAAS_REGISTER
((JS_PRINCIPAL = #{name} and JS_UNIT = #{orgName}) or GOV_PRINCIPAL_IDCARD =#{idCard} or (JS_PRINCIPAL = #{name} and JS_PRINCIPAL_PHONE = #{phone})) and status = 3
NAME = #{appName}
order by MODIFIED_TIME desc

SELECT count(DISTINCT ai.ID) FROM TB_SAAS_REGISTER ai join TB_WFM_INSTANCE ins on ins.BUSINESSID = ai.ID join TB_WFM_ACTIVITY act on act.INSTANCEID = ins.ID WHERE ai.STATUS in (1,2,7,101,102) and act.HANDLEPERSONIDS = #{user.idcard} and act.ACTIVITYTYPE is null and act.ACTIVITYSTATUS = '待办'
